data.name: Add
data.comment: Label for any 'Add' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AddFolder
data.comment: Label for any 'Add folder' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AgreeCreateAccount
data.comment: Text placed just before a link labeled 'Term of Service' into the 'create account' page.

data.name: AppName
data.comment: Label with the application name. Try to preserve uppercase - (NO-TRANSLATION).

data.name: Cancel
data.comment: Label for any 'Cancel' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CloudDriveName
data.comment: Label for any 'Cloud Drive' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: Confirm
data.comment: Label for any 'Confirm' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ConfirmPasswordWatermark
data.value: あなたのパスワードを確認
data.comment: Watermark label for the confirmation password field into 'create account' page or when changing the password - (String as short as possible).

data.name: Copy
data.comment: Label for any 'Copy' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: EmailWatermark
data.value: あなたのメールアドレス
data.comment: Watermark label for the e-mail address field when create/confirm account and login - (String as short as possible).

data.comment: Label for the background of an empty transfers page - (String as short as possible).

data.name: LoadingPreview
data.value: プレビューアップロード中..
data.comment: Label shown with an animation when the app is loading a preview - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MegaLinkTitle
data.comment: Text placed just before the link that will be shared or copied to clipboard. Try to preserve the MEGA uppercase word. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: MegaShareLinkMessage
data.value: MEGAクラウドサービスのファイルをあなたと共有したい
data.comment: Text used as title of the message to share a MEGA link.

data.comment: Label for the menu option to sort the nodes of the cloud drive in descending order by type - (String as short as possible).

data.comment: Label for the menu option to sort the nodes of the cloud drive in descending order by size (from bigger to smaller) - (String as short as possible).

data.comment: Text placed just before the form to 'Make a PIN Lock'. Try to preserve the PIN uppercase word. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InitTourAccess1
data.comment: Label 'get' for the first part of the sentence 'get fully encrypted access anywhere, anytime.', to build this sentence in three colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourAccess2
data.comment: Label 'fully encrypted access' for the second part of the sentence 'get fully encrypted access anywhere, anytime.', to build this sentence in three colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourAccess3
data.comment: Label 'anywhere, anytime.' for the third part of the sentence 'get fully encrypted access anywhere, anytime.', to build this sentence in three colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourAccess_Title
data.comment: Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the easy access. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InitTourPrivacy1
data.value: ファイル名はMEGAのと同じにする
data.comment: Label 'keep your files safe with MEGA's' for the first part of the sentence 'keep your files safe with MEGA's end-to-end encryption.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase less the word MEGA in uppercase.

data.name: InitTourPrivacy2
data.comment: Label 'end-to-end encryption.' for the second part of the sentence 'keep your files safe with MEGA's end-to-end encryption.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourPrivacy_Title
data.comment: Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the privacy. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InitTourSpace1
data.comment: Label 'register now and get' for the first part of the sentence 'register now and get 50 GB of free space.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourSpace2
data.value: 50 GB のスペースが無料。
data.comment: Label '50 GB of free space.' for the second part of the sentence 'register now and get 50 GB of free space.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string.

data.name: InitTourSpace_Title
data.comment: Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the space. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: InitTourSpeed1
data.comment: Label 'transfers are fast.' for the first part of the sentence 'transfers are fast. quickly share files with everyone.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourSpeed2
data.comment: Label 'quickly share files with everyone.' for the second part of the sentence 'transfers are fast. quickly share files with everyone.', to build this sentence in two colors into the init tour page. Don't forget to place '.' at the end of the string. Keep all in lowercase.

data.name: InitTourSpeed_Title
data.comment: Label for the title of the init tour page dedicated to the speed. Keep MEGA in uppercase and the rest in lowercase, without any punctuation marks. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AccountPurchased
data.value: {0} アカウントの購入、ありがとうございます。
data.comment: Label to indicate the purchased account/subscription. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name/type in runtime.

data.name: AccountRenewalNotice
data.value: {0} 定期契約の料金は、前もってキャンセルされない限り、 {0} 後の更新時に自動的に請求されます。
data.comment: Label to indicate the renewal period of the purchased subscription. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the renewal period string (Monthly or Annually) in runtime.

data.name: GetProAccount
data.value: あなたもプロユーザーになれる！
data.comment: Label for the dialog shown randomly when a user logs into a free account, notifying the user the possibility of upgrade the account - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UpgradeAccountQuestion
data.value: アカウントをアップグレードしますか？
data.comment: Label for the dialog shown randomly when a user logs into a free account, asking if the user wants to upgrade the account - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UpgradeNow
data.value: アップグレードしよう！
data.comment: Label for the 'Upgrade now!' button of the dialog shown randomly when a user logs into a free account - (String as short as possible).

data.name: WarningOutOfSpace
data.value: もうすぐスペースがいっぱいになります。
data.comment: Warning message in Cloud Drive when the user is running out of space

data.name: AddContact
data.comment: Label for any 'Add contact' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: CreateContact
data.value: メールアドレスを入力して下さい:
data.comment: Text to show when a user wants to add a contact to type the email address of the new contact.

data.name: TimeDaysAgo
data.comment: Laber to indicate "time ago" in days - (String as short as possible). Preserve the {0} code because is for include a number in runtime.

data.name: TimeHoursAgo
data.comment: Laber to indicate "time ago" in hours - (String as short as possible). Preserve the {0} code because is for include a number in runtime.

data.name: TimeMinutesAgo
data.comment: Laber to indicate "time ago" in minutes - (String as short as possible). Preserve the {0} code because is for include a number in runtime.

data.name: TimeSecondsAgo
data.comment: Laber to indicate "time ago" in seconds - (String as short as possible). Preserve the {0} code because is for include a number in runtime.

data.name: AutoUpload
data.comment: Label for "Auto Upload" settings pivot

data.name: General
data.comment: Label for "General" settings pivot

data.name: Developer
data.comment: Label for "Developer" type of acknowledgement

data.name: ViewDetails
data.comment: Label for any 'View details' button, link, text, title, etc. (i.e. View contact details) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: PhotosOnly
data.comment: Label for the "Photos only" auto camera upload settings

data.name: PowerConnected
data.value: 外部電源が接続されました。
data.comment: Label for the "External power source connected" auto camera upload settings

data.comment: Label for the auto camera upload setting options

data.comment: Label asking user if wants to enable the auto camera uploads service.

data.name: ShareFolder
data.comment: Label for any 'Share folder' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: NewPasswordWatermark
data.comment: Watermark label for the new password field when changing account password - (String as short as possible).

data.name: ManageLink
data.comment: Label for any 'Manage link' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: OSRestrictions
data.comment: Label for the auto camera upload service restrictions.

data.name: SavedForOffline
data.comment: Label for any 'Saved for offline' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible, LESS THAN 22 CHARS).

data.name: EmptyCloudDrive
data.value: クラウドドライブにあるファイルなし
data.comment: Label for the background of an empty cloud drive page - (String as short as possible).

data.name: EmptyOffline
data.comment: Label for the background of an empty transfers page - (String as short as possible).

data.name: EmptyRubbishBin
data.comment: Label for the background of an empty rubbish bin page - (String as short as possible).

data.name: EmptySharedFolders
data.comment: Label for the background of an empty shared folders page - (String as short as possible).

data.name: NoDownloads
data.comment: Label for the background of an empty downloads page - (String as short as possible).

data.name: NoInternetConnection
data.comment: Label for the background of an empty state when no internet connection - (String as short as possible).

data.name: NoUploads
data.comment: Label for the background of an empty uploads page - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DefaultDownloadLocation
data.value: デフォルトダウンロードフォルダを選択してください。
data.comment: Default value for the string shown into the preferences page. It will substituted by the path of the folder selected by the user when selecting a default location for downloads.

data.comment: Label for any 'Cancel subscription' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.comment: Label for any 'Remove link' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.comment: Watermark label for the user's first name field when create account - (String as short as possible).

data.comment: Watermark label for the user's last name field when create account - (String as short as possible).

data.name: SelectAll
data.comment: Label for any 'Select' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: DeselectAll
data.comment: Label for any 'Select' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_OpenMegaLink
data.comment: Label for any 'Open MEGA link' button, link, text, title, etc. Try to preserve the MEGA uppercase word - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_PasteMegaLink
data.comment: Label for dialog message to import/download a MEGA link - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_ImportLinkBorderText
data.comment: Label for the dialog shown when a user are trying to import a MEGA link - (String as short as possible). Preserve the {0} code because is for include the name of the destination folder in runtime.

data.name: UI_Decrypt
data.comment: Label for any 'Decrypt' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_DecryptionKey
data.comment: Label for any 'Decryption key' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_FileLink
data.comment: Label for any 'File link' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_FolderLink
data.comment: Label for any 'Folder link' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_OpenLink
data.comment: Label for any 'Open link' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_ExportRecoveryKeyText
data.value: リカバリーキーをエクスポート
data.comment: Text 'Export Recovery Key' placed just before two buttons into the 'settings' page to allow see (copy/paste) and export the Recovery Key.

data.name: UI_RecoveryKey
data.comment: Label for any 'Recovery Key' button, link, text, title, etc. Preserve uppercase - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_DebugMode
data.comment: Label for any 'Debug mode' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_MemoryStatistics
data.comment: Label for any 'Memory statistics' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_Added
data.comment: Label for any 'Added' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible). NOTE: Keep the capital letter if possible.

data.name: UI_AvailableOffline
data.value: オフラインでも入手可能
data.comment: Label for any 'Available Offline' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible). NOTE: Keep the capital letter if possible.

data.name: UI_Content
data.comment: Label for any 'Content' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible). NOTE: Keep the capital letter if possible.

data.name: UI_Modified
data.comment: Label for any 'Modified' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible). NOTE: Keep the capital letter if possible.

data.name: UI_Size
data.comment: Label for any 'Size' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible). NOTE: Keep the capital letter if possible.

data.name: UI_FromBasePrice
data.comment: Label for indicate the base price of a product or plan, for example "From 9,99 €/month" - (String as short as possible). Keep the code {0:N} because is for include price of the product in runtime. Keep the code {1} because is for include currency in runtime.

data.name: UI_InAppPurchase
data.comment: Label for any 'In app purchase' (IAP) button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_Free
data.comment: Label for any 'Free' button, link, text, title, etc. Is to indicate that is a product free of charges, no costs - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_LinkWithKey
data.comment: Label for any 'Link with key' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_LinkWithoutKey
data.comment: Label for any 'Link without key' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_ProOnly
data.comment: Label to indicate that a feature is only available for PRO users. Keep between parentheses and capital letters - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_SetExpirationDate
data.comment: Label for any 'Set expiry date' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateCanceled
data.value: キャンセルされました。
data.comment: Label for the state of a canceled transfer - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateCompleting
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is being completing - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateDownloaded
data.comment: Label for the state of a download transfer when is finished - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateDownloading
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is being downloading - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateError
data.comment: Label for the state of a failed transfer - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateNotStarted
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is ready but not started for some reason - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStatePaused
data.comment: Label for the state of a paused transfer - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStatePreparing
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is being preparing - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateQueued
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is queued - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateRetrying
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is being retrying - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateUploaded
data.comment: Label for the state of an upload transfer when is finished - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_TransferStateUploading
data.value: アップロードしているのは...
data.comment: Label for the state of a transfer when is being uploading - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_CancelDownloads
data.comment: Label for any 'Cancel downloads' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_CancelUploads
data.comment: Label for any 'Cancel uploads' button, link, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_Completed
data.comment: Label for any 'Completed' button, link, text, title, etc. - (String as short as possible).

data.name: UI_NoCompletedTransfers
data.comment: Label for the background of an empty completed transfers page - (String as short as possible).
